00047                 echo "  Fatal error on line $errline in file $errfile";

00050         }
00051         elseif($errno === E_USER_WARNING){
00052                 echo "<b>WARNING</b> [$errno] $errstr<br />\n";
00053         }
00054         elseif($errno === E_USER_NOTICE){
00055                 echo "<b>NOTICE</b> [$errno] $errstr<br />\n";
00056         }
00057         else {
00058                 echo "Unknown error type: [$errno] $errstr<br />\n";
00059         }
00060         /* Don't execute PHP internal error handler */
00061         return true;
